thread.title: Hawaii: Tropical Storm Hilda continues to weaken

author: eTN Global Editor
title: Hawaii: Tropical Storm Hilda continues to weaken
text:
Hawaii: Tropical Storm Hilda continues to weaken   
Aug 12, 2015 Banners   
HONOLULU, Hawaii - Hilda was downgraded to a tropical storm yesterday and is forecast to weaken into a tropical depression by Thursday. 
A tropical storm watch, flash flood watch and high surf warning remain in effect for Hawaii Island, as heavy rainfall, strong trades and high surf along east-facing shores are expected. 
Neighboring islands are expected to experience similar weather conditions through the end of the week.
